definition: a gymnastic exercise performed on the rings or horizontal bar or parallel bars when the gymnast's weight is supported by the arms, suspend (meat) in order to get a gamey taste
details:
noun
- a gymnastic exercise performed on the rings or horizontal bar or parallel bars when the gymnast's weight is supported by the arms
- the way a garment hangs
= example: the way a garment hangs
- a special way of doing something
= synonyms: bent, knack
verb
- suspend (meat) in order to get a gamey taste
= example: suspend (meat) in order to get a gamey taste
- hold on tightly or tenaciously
= example: hold on tightly or tenaciously
= synonyms: cling
- cause to be hanging or suspended
= synonyms: hang up
- place in position as by a hinge so as to allow free movement in one direction
= example: place in position as by a hinge so as to allow free movement in one direction
- be placed in position as by a hinge
= example: be placed in position as by a hinge
- be suspended or poised
- be suspended or hanging
- fall or flow in a certain way
= example: fall or flow in a certain way
= synonyms: fall
- decorate or furnish with something suspended
- let drop or droop
- give heed (to)
= synonyms: attend, pay heed, give ear
- kill by hanging
= example: kill by hanging
= synonyms: string up
- prevent from reaching a verdict, of a jury
- be menacing, burdensome, or oppressive
= example: be menacing, burdensome, or oppressive
- be exhibited
